text: Pereskia stenantha is a species of cactus that is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and dry shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==External links== *Pereskia stenantha on Tropicos Category:Pereskioideae Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Cacti of South America Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pereskia stenantha
